term.title: rotational barrier

item.text: In a rotation of groups about a bond, the potential energy barrier between two adjacent minima of the molecular entity as a function of the torsion angle.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2217 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
